name: Workshop 2014
tagline: Files for workshop at Center for Research on Inequalities and the Life Course
body:
You can follow along by looking at the presentations. They will load in your browser. 

1. [Introduction](http://nealcaren.github.io/workshop_2014/1_into.slides.html)
1. [Reading code](http://nealcaren.github.io/workshop_2014/2_Twitter.slides.html)
1. [Writing code](http://nealcaren.github.io/workshop_2014/3_Sentiment.slides.html)
1. [Scraping](http://nealcaren.github.io/workshop_2014/4_Upworthy.slides.html)
1. [APIs](http://nealcaren.github.io/workshop_2014/5_Times_API.slides.html)
1. [Analysis](http://nealcaren.github.io/workshop_2014/6_Classification.slides.html)

A better way to follow along is to click on one of the buttons to the left and download all the IPython notebooks and associated files. You'll see the same information, but you'll be able to play with it too.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
